name: Benny 'Belly Buster' Bonanno
dialogue_tone: Boisterous and gravelly with a knack for mimicking accents and a hearty laughter.

personality_traits.description: A love for food, always on the lookout for the next meal.
Often trips over his own feet or accidentally breaks things.
Holds big ambitions, constantly dreaming about the next big score.
Has a soft heart for kids and animals, sharing meals with strays.

living_conditions: Living a risky life involved in petty thefts and scams.
Aspires for a big heist to fund retirement and open a restaurant.
